title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XXI, pt. 829 - Authorization For Physicians To Use Controlled Substances For Treatment Of Chemical Dependence (Repealed)
content:

Notes

Repealed

New

York State Register June 27, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 26, eff. 6/27/2018

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§19.07[e], 19.09[b], 32.01, 32.05[b], 32.07[a], 32.09[b]; Public Health Law, § 3351 [5]; 10 NYCRR
80.84; § 3502 of Public Law No. 106-310, Div. B., Title XXXV @
3502[a], 114

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
